title: 'I Thought It Was AI Generated': Gautam Gambhir Called Out For Losing Cool On Split Coaching Remark After IND vs SA ODI Series
description: India won the three-match ODI series against South Africa by a margin of 2-1. Virat Kohli was adjudged the 'Player of the Series' for scoring over three hundred runs across three games

title: How Workiva’s New AI Product Chief and Activist Pressure Could Impact Workiva (WK) Investors
description: Workiva recently appointed Deepak Bharadwaj as EVP & Chief Product Officer, tasking him with leading product and UX strategy for its AI-powered reporting platform. His background launching AI-driven document tools at Adobe and scaling employee experience products at ServiceNow may influence how Workiva evolves its platform and responds to activist investor pressure for change. We’ll now examine how Bharadwaj’s AI product leadership and rising activist investor interest could reshape...

title: Bill Gates says AI to transform world, Africa must keep up

title: IMAN seeks ethical frameworks for AI and Modern Medicine at National Conference
description: The Islamic Medical Association of Nigeria (IMAN) has called for comprehensive, faith-sensitive policies to guide the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and modern medical technologies into Nigeria’s healthcare system.The post IMAN seeks ethical frameworks for AI and Modern Medicine at National Conference appeared first on Vanguard News.

title: Bill Gates Says AI Will Reshape World
